title: Pixel 2 Bluetooth pin incorrect
content:
Whenever I try to pair a new device via bluetooth with my Pixel 2 I get a pin error. The bluetooth devices - my car, laptop etc.. - find my phone and ask if the pin codes match however no pin shows on my phone other than it saying "pairing".
If I click continue it says pin code error, pins don't match. Driving my crazy !!!
Have turned phone and devices off/on, cleared cache but nothing seems to work. Help !!
